data.text: @Mindcite_US Stop trying to make political points on the bodies of patriotic Ukrainians - it’s disgusting
@6stargenChris @GeorgeK73558717 @Mindcite_US I can't remember. Zall good homey.

@Elpelado678 @GeorgeK73558717 @Mindcite_US Please, if you’re pissed off about me, what did I ever do to a poor misguided person, who attacks bystanders by mean tweets, like, there’s no value to that. What else did I ever trigger you?

@6stargenChris @GeorgeK73558717 @Mindcite_US Oh for sure. Isn't that why we're here?
No point.
@Elpelado678 @GeorgeK73558717 @Mindcite_US Twitter jail? Is it because you constantly harass and threaten others? And you bet your ass I did. So, what’s your point?

@Elpelado678 @GeorgeK73558717 @Mindcite_US And if you think that I’m some “Russian sympathizer” Please, I beg to differ my dignity, where’s yours, you don’t care about black people being stranded in Ukraine do you? That’s the problem, I used to be a Democrat like you, but not anymore since they reveal their colors in 2020

@Elpelado678 @GeorgeK73558717 @Mindcite_US You do realize by any moment that the US is going to ban air travel to there. Plus, I lost my interest into the city, now I’m willing to go to Yerevan, very fine place while Moscow is too crowded with corruption. So, stop living in 2016 and move on, it’s pathetic.
@Mindcite_US @danielme1980 Not a man vs. A Statesman
